body_html: I would also be interested in knowing how to solve this issue. From my understanding, tensorflow::ops::Variable does not expose the tensor so we can memcpy into it. Is there any other way to get the cuda pointer from the Variable?
body_text: I would also be interested in knowing how to solve this issue. From my understanding, tensorflow::ops::Variable does not expose the tensor so we can memcpy into it. Is there any other way to get the cuda pointer from the Variable?
